text: Thallium(III) hydroxide, Tl(OH)3, also known as thallic hydroxide, is a hydroxide of thallium. It is a white solid. Thallium(III) hydroxide is a very weak base; it is changed to thallium(III) ion, Tl3+, only in strongly acid conditions. ==References== ==External links== Category:Hydroxides Category:Thallium(III) compounds
title: Thallium(III) hydroxide
